title: The Heat and Suns Handle Business at Home | Group Chat
description:
Justin, Rob, and Wos discuss the Suns putting on a clinic in the second half and pulling away from the Mavericks to take a 2-0 series lead (1:45). Then they discuss the Heat dominating the Sixers again at home and if the Sixers have any solutions to stop the Heat with no Joel Embiid (25:04). 

Hosts: Justin Verrier, Rob Mahoney, Wosny Lambre 
Associate Producer: Isaiah Blakely 
Additional Production Supervision: Benjamin Cruz
